value:
Fáfnir, Ótr—my brothers... If only
we could go back to when we lived
together in peace...

In my country, there are many
incredible machines. I'd love to
understand what makes them tick!

One thing you ought to know about
me is, I'm an excellent cook. I could
make a great meal here and now!

Being in such a huge castle is so
exciting! Want to explore with me?
...Prince Alfonse won't mind, right?

My brother gave me this compass.
I like to keep it polished. The day may
come when I'll need to use it again.

My name's Reginn! Let's be friends!
I'm already full-on friends with your
friend $Nf, soo...
All thanks to $Nu!

I want to get stronger, but I know
I mustn't rush it.

Ugh. Disappointing. But I mustn't
give in to misery...

Oh, wow! You're sure? I won't let
this go to waste!

I'm Reginn! I'm here to help, and that
is exactly what I'll do. Pretty soon
you and I will be full-on friends!

...Oh! I hadn't noticed you there.
Sorry about that. I can be a bit
absentminded sometimes.$k$pI know I'm usually thinking about
my brothers, but...this time I was
thinking about you.$k$pYou're just...such a mystery to
me, $Nu!$k$pYou forgave me for attacking you,
and you agreed to help me, and...
I appreciate that.$k$pWhen I'm with you, I feel a little
more at ease. Which isn't to say
I don't feel nervous around you...$k$p...Now's no time to get shy, Reginn!$k$pI don't know what the future has
in store, but it's comforting to know
you'll be right there with me.
やあっ
えーいっ！
きゃあっ
I'll lose...!
This is it for you!
I'm going to stop you!
I don't think so!
Just like Fáfnir...
Not good enough...
Ehehe
I'm Reginn. Who are you? ... No, let me start again. I am Reginn. It's an honor to make your acquaintance.
Argh! Oh, it's you? Cut it out already!
I don't remember my parents, but... Don't waste your worry on me. I'm not sad.
My brother Fáfnir is a Hero to me. He's always protected me.
Ótr may be hot-tempered, but underneath it all, he's a sweet guy.
I hope my brothers and I can all live together as a family again someday.
Thanks for all your help. Before you know it, I'll be returning the favor!
Yeah!
Over here?
I won't lose!
